jobTitle: Material Planning & Logistics Specialist - Remote | WFH
description:
Are you a supply chain wizard with a passion for optimization?

We're seeking a talented Material Planning and Logistics Specialist to join our fast-growing team! You'll play a vital role in ensuring the smooth flow of materials and products across our operations.

What You'll Do

Master the supply chain: Develop and execute material plans to ensure timely availability of materials.

Build strong relationships: Collaborate with suppliers and internal teams to optimize the supply chain.

Be a data-driven decision-maker: Analyze inventory levels, identify trends, and implement strategies to improve efficiency.

Ensure on-time delivery: Coordinate logistics activities and resolve any shipping issues.

Drive process improvement: Identify opportunities to enhance the supply chain and implement best practices.

What You'll Need

At least 7 years of experience in material planning, logistics, or supply chain management.

A bachelor's degree in supply chain management, business administration, or a related field.

Proficiency in ERP systems and data analysis tools.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

Ready to take on a challenging and rewarding role?

We offer a competitive salary, opportunity for growth, and the chance to work in a dynamic and innovative company.

Employment Type: Full-Time
